eu.geclipse.core.model
Class GridModel

java.lang.Object
  eu.geclipse.core.model.GridModel

public class GridModel
extends java.lang.Object

The GridModel class is mainly a helper class for dealing with grid model elements. It defines a method the retrieve the root element of the model (@link getRoot()) and several other methods to get element creators for specific use cases.

Constructor Detail

GridModel

public GridModel()
Method Detail

getConnectionManager

public static IConnectionManager getConnectionManager()
Get the manager that is dedicated to the management of IGridConnections.

Returns:
The core implementation of the IConnectionManager interface.

getJobManager

public static IGridJobManager getJobManager()
Get the manager that is dedicated to the management of IGridJobs.

Returns:
The core implementation of the IGridJobManager interface.

getRoot

public static IGridRoot getRoot()
Get the root element of the grid model tree. This is an immutable internal implementation of the IGridRoot interface. It is created as singleton the first time this method is called. In subsequent calls this method returns the singleton instance that was created formerly.

Returns:
The root of all evil, i.e. the root element of the grid model.
See Also:
GridRoot.getInstance()

getStandardCreators

public static java.util.List<IGridElementCreator> getStandardCreators()
Get a list of all know standard creators, i.e. IGridElementCreators that are not specified as extensions of the eu.geclipse.core.gridElementCreator extension point but that belong to the core functionality to create elements. Examples for such creators are the GridProjectCreator or the LocalResourceCreator.

Returns:
A list containing all know standard implementations of the IGridElementCreator interface.

getElementCreator

public static IGridElementCreator getElementCreator(java.lang.Object fromObject,
                                                    java.lang.Class<? extends IGridElement> elementType)
Get an IGridElementCreator that is able to create an element of the specified type from the specified object.

Parameters:
fromObject - The object from which to create the element.
elementType - The type of the element to be created.
Returns:
An appropriate element creator or null if no such creator is currently registered.

getElementCreators

public static java.util.List<IGridElementCreator> getElementCreators()
Get a list of all element creators that are defined as extensions of the eu.geclipse.core.gridElementCreator extension point.

Returns:
All externally defined element creators.
See Also:
Extensions.getRegisteredElementCreators()

getElementCreators

public static java.util.List<IGridElementCreator> getElementCreators(java.lang.Class<? extends IGridElement> elementType)
Get a list of all element creators that are able to create IGridElements of the specified type. Note that this method only searches the extended creators and not the standard creators.

Parameters:
elementType - The type of the element that should be created.
Returns:
A list containing all currently registered IGridElementCreators that are able to create elements of the specified type.
See Also:
getElementCreators()

getStorableElementCreators

public static java.util.List<IStorableElementCreator> getStorableElementCreators()
Get all element creators that implement the IStorableElementCreator interface. Note that this method only searches the extended creators and not the standard creators.

Returns:
A list containing all currently registered element creators that implement the IStorableElementCreator interface.
See Also:
getElementCreators()

getStorableElementCreator

public static IStorableElementCreator getStorableElementCreator(org.eclipse.core.filesystem.IFileStore fileStore)
Get an IStorableElementCreator that is able to create an element from the specified file store. Searches the list returned by getStorableElementCreators().

Parameters:
fileStore - The IFileStore from which to create an element.
Returns:
A creator that is able to create an element from the specified file store or null if no such creator could be found.
See Also:
getStorableElementCreators()

getJobCreators

public static java.util.List<IGridJobCreator> getJobCreators()
Get a list of all element creators that implement the IGridJobCreator interface. Note that this method only searches the extended creators and not the standard creators.

Returns:
All currently registered job creators.
See Also:
getElementCreators()

getJobCreators

public static java.util.List<IGridJobCreator> getJobCreators(IGridJobDescription description)
Get a list of all job creators that are able to create a job from the specified IGridJobDescription. Searches the list returned by getJobCreators().

Parameters:
description - The job description from which to create a job.
Returns:
All currently registered job managers that are able to create a job from the specified description.
See Also:
getJobCreators()

getPreferences

public static IGridPreferences getPreferences()
                                       throws GridModelException
Get the grid preferences.

Returns:
An instance of IGridPreferences.
Throws:
GridModelException - If the preferences could not be found or the creation of the preferences failed.

Returns:

getVoCreators

public static java.util.List<IGridElementCreator> getVoCreators()
Get all element creators that are able to create IVirtualOrganizations.

Returns:
A list of all IGridElementCreators that are able to create virtual organizations.

getVoManager
